parameters.name: LayerColor
parameters.description: COLORREF value specifying the color of items in this layer

parameters.name: LayerStyle
parameters.description: Line style as defined in swLineStyles_e

parameters.name: LayerWidth
parameters.description: Line width as defined in swLineWeights_e

parameters.name: BOn
parameters.description: True makes this layer visible, false makes it invisible

parameters.name: BPrint
parameters.description: True to print this layer when printing the document, false to not

title: IDrawingDoc.CreateLayer2
description: Creates a layer for this document.
signature:
System.Boolean CreateLayer2( 
   System.String
Layername
,
   System.String
LayerDesc
,
   System.Int32
LayerColor
,
   System.Int32
LayerStyle
,
   System.Int32
LayerWidth
,
   System.Boolean
BOn
,
   System.Boolean
BPrint
)

parameters.name: LayerColor
parameters.description: COLORREF value specifying the color of items in this layer

parameters.name: LayerStyle
parameters.description: Line style as defined in swLineStyles_e

parameters.name: LayerWidth
parameters.description: Line width as defined in swLineWeights_e

parameters.name: BOn
parameters.description: True makes this layer visible, false makes it invisible

parameters.name: BPrint
parameters.description: True to print this layer when printing the document, false to not

returns: True if the layer was created successfully, false if not
remarks:
If this layer is not visible, then SOLIDWORKS does not display entities on the layer.
Do not use backslash or @ symbols in Layername.
